data.title: How to Add Context KPIs to AI Roadmap? - Context Architecture
data.description: I explain how to add context KPIs to AI roadmap. Traditional AI KPIs (accuracy, speed, cost) are not sufficient. Metrics like context quality, context consistency, context freshness are the real indicators of AI success. Context Architecture experts define metrics like Context Relevance Score, Context Freshness Index, Context Consistency Rate. Result: AI roadmap transforms to business value metrics, investment decisions become more accurate.
